verses.verse: וַיִּשְׁמַ֗ע <WH8085> vai-yish-Ma', And he heard אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- דִּבְרֵ֤י <WH1697> div-Rei the words בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> ve-nei- sons לָבָן֙ <WH3837> la-Van of Laban's לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> le-Mor, saying לָקַ֣ח <WH3947> la-Kach hath taken away יַעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> ya-'a-Ko, Jacob אֵ֖ת <WH853> 'et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher what לְאָבִ֑ינוּ <WH1> le-'a-Vi-nu; all that [was] our father's וּמֵאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> u-me-'a-Sher what לְאָבִ֔ינוּ <WH1> le-'a-Vi-nu, and of [that] which [was] our father's עָשָׂ֕ה <WH6213> 'a-Sah hath he gotten אֵ֥ת <WH853> 'et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הַכָּבֹ֖ד <WH3519> hak-ka-Vod all this glory הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> haz-Zeh. this

וַיַּ֥רְא <WH7200> vai-Yar beheld יַעֲקֹ֖ב <WH3290> ya-'a-Ko And Jacob אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> pe-Nei the countenance לָבָ֑ן <WH3837> la-Van; of Laban וְהִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> ve-hin-Neh and behold אֵינֶ֛נּוּ <WH369> 'ei-nen-Nu not עִמּ֖וֹ <WH5973> im-Mo toward כִּתְמ֥וֹל <WH8543> kit-Mol and behold it [was] not toward him as שִׁלְשֽׁוֹם׃ <WH8032> shil-Shom. before

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶֽל־ <WH413> 'el- to יַעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> ya-'a-Ko, unto Jacob שׁ֛וּב <WH7725> shuv Return אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> 'E-retz unto the land אֲבוֹתֶ֖יךָ <WH1> a-vo-Tei-cha of thy fathers וּלְמוֹלַדְתֶּ֑ךָ <WH4138> u-le-mo-lad-Te-cha; and to thy kindred וְאֶֽהְיֶ֖ה <WH1961> ve-'eh-Yeh become עִמָּֽךְ׃ <WH5973> 'im-Mach. with

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer And said לָהֶ֗ן la-Hen, רֹאֶ֤ה <WH7200> ro-'Eh unto them I see אָנֹכִי֙ <WH595> 'a-no-Chi I אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> pe-Nei countenance אֲבִיכֶ֔ן <WH1> 'a-vi-Chen, your father's כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- that it אֵינֶ֥נּוּ <WH369> 'ei-Nen-nu is not אֵלַ֖י <WH413> 'e-Lai toward כִּתְמֹ֣ל <WH8543> kit-Mol that it [is] not toward me as שִׁלְשֹׁ֑ם <WH8032> shil-Shom; before וֵֽאלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> ve-lo-Hei but the God אָבִ֔י <WH1> 'a-Vi, of my father הָיָ֖ה <WH1961> ha-Yah hath been עִמָּדִֽי׃ <WH5978> 'im-ma-Di. against

Here
